summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3635 for the improvement of West 72nd Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest, to 32nd Avenue Northwest, by constructing concrete walks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44921, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
